sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Monday, with over 917,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 26,000.
Shares of PKB were off about 0.2% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Monday were PulteGroup ( PHM ), trading up about 1.7% with over 3.3 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Home Depot ( HD ), off about 0.1% on volume of over 3.2 million shares.
Headwaters ( HW ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF Monday, trading lower by about 2.1%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
